doc.name: JAIPeriodicShift
doc.description: An actor that computes the periodic translation of an image. The output is clamped version of the infinitely periodic image with the horizontal and vertical periods equal to the image width and height respectively.
doc.author: James Yeh
doc.property: The amount to shift in the horizontal direction. This value must be positive. An increase in this value causes the image to move to the left.
The amount to shift in the vertical direction. This value must be positive. An increase in this value causes the image to move upwards.
